title: How to Make Aged Raw Nut Cheese
directions: Blend all ingredients in food processor until smooth. Put in cheese cloth thatâ€™s draped in a colander, sitting in a bowl. Let this sit on top of your fridge for 2 days, then store it in glassware and keep in fridge for about 2 weeks, more or less. Dehydrate or warm in oven before serving to make a firmer exterior. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 cup nuts (almonds, cashews, macadamia, pine nuts, walnuts, etc.)
Other herbs and spices, as desired (basil, etc. would be lovely)
